metadata.title: Jorge Noguera | yoryer.com
metadata.description: Personal website and portfolio of Jorge Noguera

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: Hi there! My name is Jorge Noguera and I'm a software engineer based in Paraguay.
about.paragraph2: My professional journey started in 2008 when I joined a company as a web developer.
about.paragraph3: Later in my career I have the opportunity to work as an Android mobile developer and more recently I was focused on hybrid mobile development using Flutter.
about.paragraph4: I've also worked on more performance oriented software like building API's or scripts for SMS Premium services.
about.paragraph5: Occasionally I do some graphic design.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: I care about UI/UX. I build responsive and dynamic web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: I develop server-side applications and RESTful APIs. I work with databases and implement business logic with various frameworks and languages.

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.description: I create cross-platform mobile applications using frameworks like Flutter, delivering native-like experiences on iOS and Android.

tasks.task1: Development of 6 mobile applications for financial entities using Flutter, 3 of them already published.
tasks.task2: Analysis and programming of a RESTful API in Spring Boot to manage users and transactions for a bank's corporate area.
tasks.task3: Implementation of payment gateways for mobile and web applications.
tasks.task4: Programming and optimization of a Premium SMS system to serve more than 100,000 subscribers.
tasks.task5: Creation of an Android device tracking application to prevent theft.
tasks.task6: Coordination of a team of 5 programmers for the development of an application for a telephone operator.
tasks.task7: Development of mobile applications for Android and iOS.
tasks.task8: Implementation of RESTful APIs for integration with third-party systems.
tasks.task10: Development of custom websites and applications for clients.
tasks.task11: Project management and direct communication with clients.
tasks.task13: Development and maintenance of web platforms.

work.title: My Work
work.projectDescription: Logo design for a local barbershop in Paraguay.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me via email at jorge.noguera@example.com or connect with me on LinkedIn.
contact.designedAndBuilt: Designed and built by Jorge Noguera
